metadata.title: CVE-2015-7636 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.252 and19.x before 19.0.0.207 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.535 onLinux, Adobe AIR before 19.0.0.213, Adobe AIR SDK before 19.0.0.213, andAdobe AIR SDK & Compiler before 19.0.0.213 allows attackers to executearbitrary code via unspecified vectors, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2015-7629, CVE-2015-7631, CVE-2015-7635, CVE-2015-7637, CVE-2015-7638,CVE-2015-7639, CVE-2015-7640, CVE-2015-7641, CVE-2015-7642, CVE-2015-7643,and CVE-2015-7644.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7636` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.535ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.535ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.535ubuntu0.14.04.1').
